precondition: User is at the Windows desktop with no applications open.
action: Right-click on the desktop and hover over 'Properties'.
expected_results: A context menu appears with various options including 'Properties'.

precondition: 'Properties' is visible in the context menu.
The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: Options for managing the operating system's visual theme are displayed.

precondition: The 'Themes' tab is selected in the 'Display Properties' dialog box.
action: Select a theme from the dropdown menu.
expected_results: The preview pane updates to show the selected theme's appearance.

precondition: A theme is selected in the 'Themes' tab.
expected_results: Options to customize, preview, or apply the screen saver settings are displayed.

action: Click the dropdown menu and select the 'Windows XP' logo screen saver.
expected_results: The 'Windows XP' logo screen saver is selected.

precondition: The 'Windows XP' logo screen saver is selected.
action: Navigate to the 'Power Options Properties' dialog by clicking the 'Power...' button.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box opens with various power management settings.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Home/Office Desk' scheme is selected with options for monitor, hard disks, system standby, and hibernation times displayed.

precondition: The 'Home/Office Desk' power scheme is selected.
action: Change the 'Turn off monitor' option to 'After 20 mins'.
expected_results: The monitor is set to turn off after 20 minutes of inactivity.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: Options for managing hibernation settings are displayed.

action: Select 'Never' from the dropdown menu in the 'Settings for Always On power scheme' section.
expected_results: The system is configured to never automatically enter hibernation mode.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is selected.
action: Set the 'Power schemes' to 'Always On' and disable power-saving features for the monitor, hard disks, system standby, and system hibernate by selecting 'Never' for each.
expected_results: The 'Always On' power scheme is selected with all power-saving features disabled.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open with the 'Always On' scheme selected and power-saving features disabled.
expected_results: The system is configured to remain fully operational without entering sleep or hibernate modes.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
action: Configure the screen saver settings to have no screen saver with a wait time of 10 minutes. Leave the option to require a password upon resuming unchecked.
expected_results: The system is configured to not activate a screen saver or require a password upon resume after 10 minutes of inactivity.
